body.p:
Greenupsburg Ky Sept 30th 1861
To His Excellency
Hon B. Magoffin Gov of Ky
Sir I hereby resign my commission in the State Guards as first Lieutenant of the company known as Greenup Guards. My commission is dated 8th May 1861

Very Respectfully Yours
J. L. Waving

Accepted
B. Magoffin
Com in Chief-
